# thecloud_scaling_group (Resource)

Scaling Group resource allows you to manage auto-scaling instance groups.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "thecloud_vpc" "main" {
  name = "main-vpc"
}

resource "thecloud_scaling_group" "web" {
  name          = "web-asg"
  vpc_id        = thecloud_vpc.main.id
  image         = "ubuntu-22.04"
  min_instances = 2
  max_instances = 10
  desired_count = 3
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `desired_count` (Number) The desired number of instances in the group.
- `image` (String) The image to use for instances in the group.
- `max_instances` (Number) The maximum number of instances in the group.
- `name` (String) The name of the scaling group.
- `vpc_id` (String) The ID of the VPC this scaling group belongs to.

### Optional

- `load_balancer_id` (String) The ID of the load balancer to associate with this group.
- `min_instances` (Number) The minimum number of instances in the group.
- `ports` (String) The port mappings for instances in the group.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The unique identifier of the scaling group.
- `status` (String) The status of the scaling group.
